title: Neverwhere
author: Neil Gaiman
decription: A tale of a hidden London, where the forgotten sould of the city roam. Richard, an ordinary bloke, suddenly finds himself cast into a London he does not recognise

title: Left Hand of Darkness
author: Ursula K LeGuin
decription: Genderfluid before it became a thing!

title: The Tale of Genji
author: Murasaki Shikibu
decription: The world's first novel? At least as we know the modern novel. A true classic.

title: The Mysteries of Udolpho
author: Ann Radcliffe
decription: A chilling tale from one of the pioneers of Gothic literature
